talents.name: +1x Brewed Up multiplier for Drunken Brawler
Cinder Brew applies Fear when ignited

abilities.desc: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy units.

Drenches himself and an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignite once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by 3 seconds when enemies are ignited. While Brewmaster is Brewed Up, His Drunken Brawler Stances are stronger. Dealing or receiving magic damage extends Brewmaster's Brewed Up duration.

Brewmaster can switch stances based on the elements he controls, gaining passive bonuses that improve against enemies when Brewed Up.,<font color=\"#9acd32\">Earth Brawler</font> - Grants 1 / 3 / 5 / 7 armor and 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 Magic Resistance. Bonuses are 2.5x when Brewed Up.,<font color=\"#87ceeb\">Storm Brawler</font> - Grants 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 evasion and 5 / 7 / 9 / 11% Bonus Move Speed. Bonuses are 2.5x when Brewed Up.,<font color=\"#FF0000\">Fire Brawler</font> - Grants 20 chance to critical strike for 120 / 140 / 160 / 180 of your attack damage and 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 Attack Speed. Crit Chance and Attack Speed is 2.5x when Brewed Up., <font color=\"#662375\">Void Brawler</font> - Grants 5 / 10 / 15 / 20% bonus Status Resistance to Brewmaster and applies a 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 Slow for 2s on attack. Slow and Status Resistance are 2.5x when affected by Cinder Brew.

Creates a Brewling based on Brewmaster's current Drunken Brawler Stance. If the Brewling moves 1600 range away from Brewmaster, it can no longer cast spells and is slowed by 50. Otherwise, all of the Brewling spells have a 100 cooldown penalty.

A new Brewling cannot be resummoned for 3s if the current one takes damage from enemy Heroes or hero-controlled units. If the Brewling dies, the ability goes on cooldown for 70 seconds.

Only one Brewling can exist at a time. If Brewmaster uses Primal Split, the existing Brewling disappears.

Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 4 specialized warriors, adept at survival, each with their own abilities. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn. 
 Shard Upgrade: Increases Primal Split duration and allows it to be cancelled early.
